name: Iron Brago

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Doom Tower battles by 34%.

skills.name: Molten Pummeling
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of decreasing the duration of all buffs by 1 turn.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Damage Multiplier: 3.6 DEF
Damage based on: [DEF]

skills.name: Fearless Charge
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 3 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns instead of the target is under two or more buffs.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 7: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 5.1 DEF
Damage based on: [DEF]

skills.name: Battle Storm
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Also, places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns if Iron Brago is under an [Increase DEF] buff.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 7: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.7 DEF
Damage based on: [DEF]

skills.name: Bestow Strength
skills.raw_description: Increases the DEF of all allies by 10% of this Championâ€™s DEF.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

seo.description: Iron Brago is a legendary def champion from the faction Orcs doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
